entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
